about_the_game:
[THE GAME]

As a humanoid creature in a new world, you have a choice:
a) pursue a path of peaceful coexistence with the local people, or
b) embark on a daring journey to establish your place through battles.

[STORY]

After a cataclysmic event on Earth, all of humanity is reborn into a fantastical realm called Farth. However, lacking enough human vessels for the billions of souls, these souls end up possessing Farthen animals. This results in the emergence of powerful and wild creatures called "Neuramon." Feared by the Farthen people for their strange new abilities, Neuramons become the target of countless hero parties tasked with their eradication.

As fate would have it, you are one of the few lucky Neuramon to awaken human intelligence and consciousness.

Facing the potential threat of your own kind, will you strive to coexist with the Farthen people and earn your right to live, or will you use your newfound powers to assert your dominance?

[PLANNED FEATURES]

  • Survival - Collect resources from the land to survive.
  • Building & Crafting - Build your base and craft tools.
  • Farming - Farm to produce a more varied array of food and materials needed for crafting.
  • Creature Collector - Catch, tame and evolve other Neuramons.
  • Beast Master - Use your Neuramons to farm, craft, build, fight, and more!
  • Multiplayer - Online co-op is planned so that you can share the journey with your friend!

content_descriptors.notes:
Cartoonish violence. No blood.
Revealing outfit when starting out with nothing but underwear.
